name: When in Manila
description: Manila is a dense stew of urban development and historic sentiment, even within heritage districts such as Rizal Park and Intramuros, you won’t be far from a branch of local fast-food giant, Jollibee. Let's wander around the city on a chariot,  strike up a conversation with a Manileño, join a round of karaoke or beat an old man at chess.
